channel.title: Can't connect from webclient, but i can from desktop client?
channel.description: What the title says, i just added a webclient, and I can't seem to connect to server from webclient, but i can from the desktop one. help?

item.title: Can't connect from webclient, but i can from desktop client?
item.dc:creator: @kid2kewl2bereal kid2kewl2bereal
item.description:
@kid2kewl2bereal wrote:

Davidi2:

When you made the webclient, did you make sure to sign it? Does it give you any error, or just ‘cannot connect to server’?

“Error connecting to server” I don’t get any errors in my server or anything. I also signed it, I’m pretty sure I signed it correctly.

EDIT: Nevermind! Thank you, very much! I signed it wrong. You da shit. ha.

Read full topic
item.source: Can't connect from webclient, but i can from desktop client?
